description:
Ikalgo is alone underground a mission to find Palm. Meanwhile, Knuckle has abandoned Meleron`s Perfect Plan and revealed himself to Youpi. Melereon leaves Knuckle and Shoot to assist the others. However, Welfin is sharp enough to notice that Flutter, under Ikalgo`s control, is behaving strangely. He also catches Melereon`s scent and gives pursuit.
Source: crunchyroll
